multi_add_portrait;Natasha;MidLeft;Knoll;MidRight
expression;Natasha;Smile
speak;Natasha;Isn't this cathedral magnificent, Knoll?|The sacred energy here is so pure, so divine!
expression;Knoll;NoSmile
speak;Knoll;It is... impressive architecture.|Though I find the abundance of light rather... overwhelming.
speak;Knoll;Rausten has never held much appeal for those of us who study elder magic.
expression;Natasha;NoSmile
speak;Natasha;That's because Rausten upholds the true teachings of the divine.|Dark magic corrupts the natural order established by the Goddess.
speak;Knoll;With respect, Sister Natasha, elder magic is merely another path to understanding the world's mysteries.
speak;Natasha;The path matters, Knoll.|Light magic heals and protects. Dark magic... it draws power from chaos and suffering.
speak;Knoll;And yet both serve their purpose in this war.|Your healing has saved us, as has my elder magic.
speak;Natasha;I cannot deny your magic has been... useful.|Though I pray for your soul whenever you cast those spells.
speak;Knoll;My soul is quite intact, I assure you.|In Grado, we believe that understanding darkness is necessary to truly appreciate light.
speak;Natasha;While in Rausten, we know that light must drive away all darkness.|It is the sacred duty of every cleric.
expression;Knoll;Smile
speak;Knoll;Perhaps we might learn from each other, rather than remain entrenched in our views?
speak;Natasha;Learn from dark magic?|The archbishop would consider that heresy...
speak;Natasha;And yet...|Our journey has forced me to reconsider many things I once held as absolute truth.
speak;Knoll;That is the beginning of wisdom.|Questioning, rather than blind acceptance.
speak;Natasha;I still believe in the sanctity of light magic, but...|Would you accept this?
speak;Natasha;It's a light tome from Rausten's library.|Perhaps by studying it, you might be drawn to a... purer path.
expression;Knoll;Smile
speak;Knoll;I understand your intentions.|And I appreciate the gesture, even if I don't share your hope for my conversion.
speak;Knoll;In that same spirit...|This is for you.
speak;Knoll;A tome of elder magic.|One of the gentler volumes from my collection.
speak;Natasha;Knoll!|I... I couldn't possibly... this goes against everything I've been taught!
expression;Knoll;NoSmile
speak;Knoll;You needn't cast from it.|But how can you condemn what you do not understand?
expression;Natasha;NoSmile
speak;Natasha;To even possess such a book...|The clerics here would be appalled.
speak;Knoll;Then keep it hidden.|Knowledge is never the enemy, Natasha, only ignorance.
speak;Natasha;I... I will consider reading it.|Though I make no promises about changing my views.
expression;Knoll;Smile
speak;Knoll;That's all I ask.|And I will study your light tome with equal consideration.
speak;Natasha;I should return to evening prayers soon.|The bishops will wonder where I've gone.
speak;Knoll;Of course.|Perhaps we can discuss what we've learned... later.
expression;Natasha;NormalBlink
speak;Natasha;Yes... later.|May the sacred light guide your path, Knoll.
bop_portrait;Knoll
speak;Knoll;And may the wisdom of the ancients bring you clarity, Natasha.
